title: Liftgear Website
description: Revamped to be Modern Shopify retail store with improved UI/UX and optimized frontend.
details:
Project scope:

  • Complete redesign of store frontend with modern aesthetics
  • Custom theme development with responsive design
  • Optimized product filtering and search functionality
  • Streamlined checkout process to improve conversion rates
  • Integration with inventory management system
  • Automated order processing and fulfillment workflows

Technologies: Shopify Liquid, JavaScript, CSS, Shopify APIs
